message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this excellent product. Given its features and value, I think a price of $22,000 feels fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I think the price is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I can't go as low as $12,000, I'm willing to come down to $19,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay up to $14,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
